resources.string: Choose the Crowne Plaza London the City hotel for successful business and gourmet dining in Londons famous Square Mile. Step into the stylish lobby of Crowne Plaza London the City where our dedicated team can help throughout your stay.

Very nice property! Stayed three nights last week and enjoyed the cool temps along with the crashing Surf. Staff was friendly and was there for anything I needed during my stay. Highly recommend this place if you like the oceanic environment with a touch of class.

Beautiful gorgeous hotel, great staff and absolutely great rates in town! I highly recommend everyone to come and stay here. The new rooms are beautiful, spacious and super clean! Best part, theres so much todo in a walking distance. Thank you Ash for all of your help! Awesome dude.
